title: (x) Shepherd of the Valley Lutheran Church logo - Bodega Sans, Arial {Kate McDonnell, Marten F}
content:
I’m looking for both types in this logo. Thanks

author: dl

comments.content: Bodega Sans for the larger lettering.
And I think “Lutheran Church” is Arial...
